plugin.name: Ditheca_Bonusloot
plugin.author: Ditheca
plugin.purpose: Substitutes bonusloot values during auction, market, and identify

trigger.name: trigger_bonusloot_sub
trigger.send:
do_trim = 0
for k, v in ipairs (TriggerStyleRuns) do text = v.text if string.len(text) > 4 then text = string.gsub (text, "Polished", "Polished+1") text = string.gsub (text, "Enhanced", "Enhanced+2") text = string.gsub (text, "Burnished", "Burnished+3") text = string.gsub (text, "Shiny", "Shiny+4") text = string.gsub (text, "Vibrant", "Vibrant+5") text = string.gsub (text, "Sparkling", "Sparkling+6") text = string.gsub (text, "Gleaming", "Gleaming+7") text = string.gsub (text, "Shimmering", "Shimmering+8") text = string.gsub (text, "Dazzling", "Dazzling+9") text = string.gsub (text, "Brilliant", "Brilliant+10") text = string.gsub (text, "Radiant", "Radiant+11") text = string.gsub (text, "Wondrous", "Wondrous+12") text = string.gsub (text, "Majestic", "Majestic+13") text = string.gsub (text, "Exalted", "Exalted+14") text = string.gsub (text, "Eternal", "Eternal+15") text = string.gsub (text, "Legendary", "Legendary+16") text = string.gsub (text, "Epic", "Epic+17") text = string.gsub (text, "Fabled", "Fabled+18") text = string.gsub (text, "Mythical", "Mythical+19") text = string.gsub (text, "Divine", "Divine+20") end if text ~= v.text then do_trim = string.len(text) - string.len(v.text) end
-- trim 2 or 3 white spaces, once if do_trim == 2 and string.match(text, "%s%s%s") then beg, final = string.find(text, "%s%s%s") text = string.sub(text, 0, beg - 1) .. string.sub(text, final) do_trim = -1 else if do_trim == 3 and string.match(text, "%s%s%s%s") then beg, final = string.find(text, "%s%s%s%s") text = string.sub(text, 0, beg - 1) .. string.sub(text, final) do_trim = -1 end end
--]]
ColourTell (RGBColourToName (v.textcolour), RGBColourToName (v.backcolour), text) end -- for Note () -- finish line off
